system.sustained: Psyker selects Psy Rating/2 Target Individuals (rounded up) within range and line of sight. Each individual makes an Opposed Willpower Test with Psyker. Those that fail must follow a simple command that can be achieved in a single round given by the psyker, such as "Flee", "Fall Over", or "Attack your allies". If the command is potentially suicidal, the targets get +20 to their Willpower Tests.
